description:
Experienced attorney John Fitch founded our Columbus law office, The Fitch Law Firm, with the goal of protecting the rights of victims who live in the Columbus area, surrounding Central Ohio and throughout the state. At our firm, we proudly represent the interests of victims suffering in the aftermath of the following:

  • Personal injury
  • Motor vehicle accidents
  • Traumatic brain injuries (TBI)
  • Medical malpractice
  • Sexual abuse
  • Trucking accidents
  • Bad drugs and medical devices

Mr. Fitch began his legal career after earning his Juris Doctor and his approval to practice law in the state of Ohio. After more than 30 years of practice, attorney Fitch has earned the respect of the legal community thanks to his dedication to justice and his extensive legal knowledge. As evidence of his peers' respect for his abilities, he has received an AV-Preeminent* peer-review rating from Martindale-Hubbell.

Whether you suffered injuries in a motor vehicle accident, you are the victim of a surgical error or your personal injuries resulted from another type of negligence, The Fitch Law Firm will work to help you pursue compensation for your injuries. If you would like to learn more about our law firm's services, you can do so by taking advantage of our offer for a free initial consultation.

*AV-Preeminent and BV-Distinguished are certification marks of Reed Elsevier Properties Inc., used in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell is the facilitator of a peer review rating process. Ratings reflect the confidential opinions of members of the Bar and the judiciary. Martindale-Hubbell ratings fall into two categories – legal ability and general ethical standards.
